enum.xl: Button has xl size. Not supported by these button styles: buttonPrimary, buttonDefault, buttonAdd, iconButtonBordered.

enum.default: Icon has default display style in this type of button.

Controls/Input/Number.title: A component are used to let the user enter a number.

readOnly.title: Determines whether control will react to user actions.

enum.vertical: Vertical orientation of the panel. The history block is displayed below.
enum.horizontal: Horizontal orientation of the panel. History block is displayed on the right.

source.title: Object that implements ISource interface for data access.

nodeProperty.title: Name of the field describing the type of the node (list, node, hidden node).

Controls/Popup/InfoBox.name: Controls/Popup/InfoBox
Controls/Popup/InfoBox.title: Component that opens a popup that is positioned relative to a specified element

floatCloseButton.title: Indicates whether control will react to user actions.

position.title: Point positioning of the target relative to infobox.

enum.tl: Popup displayed on the top of the target and aligned by left border.
enum.tc: Popup displayed on the top of the target and aligned by center.
enum.tr: Popup displayed on the top of the target and aligned by right border.
enum.bl: Popup displayed on the bottom of the target and aligned by left border.
enum.bc: Popup displayed on the bottom of the target and aligned by center.
enum.br: Popup displayed on the bottom of the target and aligned by right border.
enum.rt: Popup displayed on the right of the target and aligned by top border.
enum.rc: Popup displayed on the right of the target and aligned by center.
enum.rb: Popup displayed on the right of the target and aligned by bottom border.
enum.lt: Popup displayed on the left of the target and aligned by top border.
enum.lc: Popup displayed on the left of the target and aligned by center.
enum.lb: Popup displayed on the left of the target and aligned by bottom border

hideDelay.title: Delay before closing after mouse leaves.

showDelay.title: Delay before opening after mouse enters.

content.title: The content to which the logic of opening and closing the template is added.

trigger.title: Event name trigger the opening or closing of the template.

enum.click: Opening by click on the content. Closing by click not on the content or template.
enum.hover:
Opening by hover on the content. Closing by hover not on the content or template.
Opening is ignored on touch devices.
enum.hover|touch: Opening by hover or touch on the content. Closing by hover not on the content or template.

Controls/Popup/Opener/Confirmation.name: Controls/Popup/Opener/Confirmation
Controls/Popup/Opener/Confirmation.title: Component that opens the confirmation popup.

Controls/Popup/Opener/Stack.name: Controls/Popup/Opener/Stack
Controls/Popup/Opener/Stack.title: Component that opens the popup to the right of content area at the full height of the screen

autofocus.title: Determines whether focus is set to the template when popup is opened.

isModal.title: Determines whether the window is modal.

closeByExternalClick.title: Determines whether possibility of closing the popup when clicking past.

width.title: Determines whether the control is displayed in full screen.

Controls/Popup/Opener/Dialog.name: Controls/Popup/Opener/Dialog
Controls/Popup/Opener/Dialog.title: Component that opens a popup that is positioned in the center of the browser window

autofocus.title: Determines whether focus is set to the template when popup is opened.

isModal.title: Determines whether the window is modal.

closeByExternalClick.title: Determines whether possibility of closing the popup when clicking past.

draggable.title: Determines whether the component can be moved.

maximize.title: Determines whether the control is displayed in full screen.

resizable.title: Determines whether popup can be resized.

top.title: Distance from the window to the top of the screen.

left.title: Distance from the window to the left border of the screen.
